General.Name: Sichuan Dawn Precision Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Dawn Precision Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of industrial robots, CNC machine tools, and mechanical transmission parts in China and internationally. The company products include narrow V-belt drives, American standard belt drives, synchronous belt drives, chain drives, connectors, gear drives, geared motors, industrial belts, fasteners, custom parts, belt pulleys, chain wheels, gears, synchronous belt wheels, shaft couplings, taper sleeves, expansion sleeves, flywheels, bushes, speed reducers, and other mechanical power transmission components and castings. It offers its products through online. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Dwan Drive Machinery Limited Liability Company and changed its name to Sichuan Dawn Precision Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2015. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Meishan, China.
